SELECT SEQ_PILL.nextval FROM DUAL
INSERT INTO TBL_PILL(PILL_ID, COMPANY_NAME, PILL_NAME, ITEM_SEQ, DETAIL_CONTENT, PILL_HOWTO, INTAKE_PRECAUTIONS, ATPNQESITM, INTRCQESITM, SEQESITM, PILL_DEPOSIT, OPEN_DATE, UPDATE_DATE, PILL_IMAGE) VALUES (#{pillId}, #{companyName}, #{pillName}, #{itemSeq}, #{detailContent}, #{pillHowto}, #{intakePrecautions}, #{atpnQesitm}, #{intrcQesitm}, #{seQesitm}, #{pillDeposit}, #{openDate}, #{updateDate}, #{pillImage})
